title: "Chaos" over China: Josh Rogin talks foreign policy, trade and Trump
description: Josh Rogin, author of "Chaos Under Heaven" and columnist for the Washington Post, joins Chuck to talk about how U.S.-China relations changed during the last four years, driven by former President Trump's personality.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Josh Rogin, author of "Chaos Under Heaven" and columnist for the Washington Post, joins Chuck to talk about how U.S.-China relations changed during the last four years, driven by former President Trump's personality.
